heading: HR02380
0: RESOLUTION URGING THE COMMITTEE ON HEALTH TO CONDUCT AN INVESTIGATION, IN AID OF LEGISLATION, INTO THE ALARMING DEATH REPORTS DUE TO CONSUMPTION OF LAMBANOG AND PROVIDE THE NECESSARY PRECAUTIONS TO THE PUBLIC
